fields.Title of Presentation: The Positive Impact of International Travel on Teaching, Research, and Service in Education
fields.Sponsoring Organization: The Center for Global Education, Boise State University
fields.Description/Abstract: Lori Gray, Director of Music Education, and Amy Wickstrom, Graduate Assistant in Music Education, will discuss their recent summer travel to the International Society for Music Education conferences in Prague, Czech Republic and Baku, Azerbaijan (July, 2018). Lori and Amy each presented several sessions in Prague and Baku that were related to their own research, teaching, and service work at Boise State and in the region. International travel and research has had a positive impact on their teaching, research, and service, providing them with a global perspective on Music Education. Lori and Amy will share their research, travel experiences, and how they plan to utilize what they have learned abroad in their classrooms and in the local Music Education community.
